title: New: Bully – I Remember
body:
**Bully** are probably the most ferocious, kick-ass band in the world right now.

This new 1.47 of music is the perfect ‘scream it in the face of an ex’ tune – “I remember getting too fucked up / I remember throwing up in your car… and I remember the way your sheets smelled”, this is no punches held rock and roll, and it’s undeniably brilliant. See you at SXSW, guys.
